metadata.title: CVE-2016-8696 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The bm_readbody_bmp function in bitmap_io.c in potrace before 1.13 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference andcrash) via a crafted BMP image, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2016-8694 and CVE-2016-8695.

criterions.comment: potrace: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
